name: Cube Battle World War Survival
description:
Are you dreaming of pixel landscapes? Looking for a fast-paced shooter to play?

Then our new game – Cube Battle World War Survival – could be just perfect for you!

Welcome to our blocky world! The ultimate goal of the game is to win more rounds than the opposing team.

**HOW TO PLAY** Use the arrow keys to control your character. Tap the FIRE button to shoot at enemies.

Game features:
- fps shooter
- blocky shooting game
- traditional gameplay
- cool gun shot sounds

Enjoy yourself with Cube Battle World War Survival ! Let's give them hell!
